system.description:
The magical effect grants the user the combat strength of a frost giant. If no strength-adjusting magical item is worn, the user inflicts double normal damage with any weapon. Additionally, the user can throw small boulders with a range of 60/130/200, dealing [[/r 3d6 #points of damage]] points of damage. The enhancement is nullified by wearing any strength-adjusting magical item.

It lasts for 7-12 turns (1d6+6), with the exact duration known only to the DM.
system.unidentifiedDesc: The flask or vial holds a swirling and mysterious concoction inside.
